name: Not My President - Level 1
description:
This is the first level of the 3D action top-down shooter "Not My President".

The presidential election is coming up on the planet Crocotopia. The president of this planet, Croc the Big, has kidnapped Earth people to force them to become volunteer helpers. The earth sent the best it could to rescue the kidnapped - the king of heroes.

To send Earth people back, you first need to find all the rocket parts scattered all over the first level platform. After you have set up the rocket and all earth people are in the rocket, you can activate the start countdown. If you are still not dead after this time, the rocket will fly back to Earth.

  • three different weapons (in this level)
  • most objects can be used as projectiles
  • do sports to get stronger and faster and to improve your health
  • there is a wood harvester (no idea what can be done with it)
  • there are cows and stoves with a large saucepan in case you get hungry
